name: Super Drill Defense+
description:
I'm uploading a bunch of my old game jam entries to itch.io because I might as well start somewhere on this website, right? This game was made for Ludum Dare 29 with a few friends (AlucardX60 and MKSTAR26).

Take control as some sort of minidrill whose goal is to defend a much
larger drill from enemy attacks. That's pretty much it. Unless you want a
story or something. Alright, heres a story. We originally planned for
you to plant a bomb and blow up the earth, but because of time
constraints we had to scrap that. We're serious, we finished with like
10 minutes left. Our programmer really needs to stop being lazy.

Use the Left mouse button, W, Up, or Space to move forward. The drill will move towards the mouse cursor.

Tips:

  • Attack enemy drills from behind, they turn slower.
  • Golems will throw rocks at you if you are close, try and draw their attention towards the walls.
  • When the minidrill respawns, you have temporary invincibility. Try to clear out as many enemies as possible in those 2 seconds.
